name: Beethoven-X
description: Beethoven-X is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

en.name: Beethoven-X
en.description: Beethoven-X is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

fr.name: Beethoven-X
fr.description: Beethoven-X est un protocole market maker automatisé sur le réseau Fantom. C'est un agrégateur de liquidités décentralisé sur lequel les utilisateurs peuvent ajouter leurs actifs dans plusieurs pools de liquidités différentes et gagner une partie des frais générés.

es.name: Beethoven-X
es.description: Beethoven-X es un creador automático de mercado en la red de Fantom. Funciona como un agregador de liquidez automatizado donde los usuarios pueden agregar sus activos a múltiples pools de liquidez para ganar una parte de las comisiones.

de.name: Beethoven-x
de.description: Beethoven X ist ein automatisiertes Market-Maker-Protokoll im Fantom-Netzwerk. Es ist ein dezentraler Liquiditätsaggregator, bei dem Nutzer ihre Vermögenswerte zu verschiedenen Liquiditätspools hinzufügen und Gebühren verdienen können.

pt.name: Beethoven-X
pt.description: Beethoven-X é um protocolo AMM na rede Fantom. É um agregador descentralizado de liquidez onde os usuários podem adicionar seus ativos em diferentes pools de liquidez e receber taxas por isto.

el.name: Beethoven-X
el.description: Beethoven-X is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

tr.name: Beethoven-X
tr.description: Beethoven-X, Fantom ağındaki otomatik bir piyasa yapıcı protokolüdür. Kullanıcıların varlıklarını birkaç farklı likidite havuzuna ekleyebilecekleri ve ücret kazanabilecekleri merkezi olmayan bir likidite toplayıcıdır.

vi.name: Beethoven-X
vi.description: Beethoven-X is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

zh.name: Beethoven-X
zh.description: Beethoven-X 是个在 Fantom 网络上的自动做市商协议。它是个去中心化的流动性聚合器。用户可以将他们的资产添加到各个不同的流动性池中以赚取费用。

hi.name: Beethoven-X
hi.description: Beethoven-X Fantom नेटवर्क पर एक स्वचालित बाजार निर्माता प्रोटोकॉल है। यह एक विकेन्द्रीकृत तरलता एग्रीगेटर है जहां उपयोगकर्ता अपनी संपत्ति को कई अलग-अलग तरलता पूल में जोड़ सकते हैं और शुल्क कमा सकते हैं।

ja.name: Beethoven-X
ja.description: Beethoven-XはFantomネットワーク上の自動マーケットメーカープロトコルです。これは分散型流動性アグリゲーターであり、ユーザーは自分の資産をいくつかの異なる流動性プールに追加し、手数料を得ることができます。

id.name: Beethoven-X
id.description: Beethoven-X is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

ru.name: Beethoven-X
ru.description: Beethoven-X is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.
